p: HK, TI and HI conceived and designed the research. HI and DVU performed RT-PCR, nucleotide sequencing and generation of phylogenetic trees. HK, TI, HI and DVU analyzed the data: HK, KS and TS collected and provided the NDV samples: HK, TI, HI and DVU drafted the manuscript. All authorsâ€™ read and approved the final manuscript.
